Timestamps:
00:00 - Introduction
00:29 - Kai to receive a rioting charge
00:51 - I've done public meet & greets befoer
01:45 - What happened at this meet & greet?
02:37 - Back to the article
02:58 - My first problem with this - "inciting" a riot
04:23 - Blame him for being an idiot with poor planning - NOT inciting a riot!
05:03 - Where the blame REALLY belongs!
07:02 - There are many parts of the world where this event would've not ended like this.
08:50 - I don't have a solution to the societal & cultural problem - but I am not going to pretend Kai's all at fault either
09:20 - Back to the article
10:32 - Louis loses his mind - MOSTLY PEACEFUL!
14:45 - What did Kai say?
17:00 - Did Kai tell someone to rob Best Buy?
18:10 - YOUTUBE SHOULD BE HELD RESPONSIBLE????
18:55 - NYT readers think Youtube should be held responsible....
19:20 - The core of my rant
24:10 - Accountability of fanbase
25:17 - Proper parenting is the fix to this
26:25 - Fining youtube is not a fix
26:45 - The problem isn't the spark - the problem is the room filled with gasoline
27:15 - Youtube robbed that CVS. Obviously
28:15 - Difference between us & Taylor Swift
29:16 - Assembling people without a permit - sure, prosecute for that
32:54 - LAWYER HAS ENTERED THE CHAT!
46:29 - Somebody gets it
50:55 - Why did he stop giving out playstations?
52:30 - Yelling fire in crowded theater
